mapper.select:
SELECT A.i_user, A.i_board, B.nick, A.title, A.addr, A.ctnt, A.hits, C.cg_nm, A.price, A.thumImage, A.image_1, A.image_2, A.image_3, A.image_4, A.image_5 FROM t_board A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN t_category C ON A.i_cg = C.i_cg
WHERE A.i_board = #{i_board}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_like i_user, i_board VALUES (#{i_user}, #{i_board})
